item.title: Disney Cars meet Planes - Movie 4 Dusty Crashes into sand!! Cars Toys Movies
item.description:
Disney Cars meet Planes - Movie 4 Dusty Crashes into sand!! Cars Toys Movies

NEXT: https://youtu.be/Ph31M6FtSfw Mater meets Dusty Crophopper: While Dusty is flying he has engine trouble causing dusty to nearly crash into Mater. Tow Mater tows Dusty out of the Kinetic Sand site and calls Mack to tow Dusty into Radiator Springs to get fixed.

item.title: Disney Pixar Cars Toys meet Planes Movie 6 | The Smokejumpers | Lightning McQueen Crashes
item.description:
Disney Pixar Cars Toys meet Planes Movie 6 | The Smokejumpers | Lightning McQueen Crashes

Disney cars Lightning McQueen gets down from Mack LIFT & LAUNCH Transporter to tell Mack that he is going to drive to Radiator Springs by himself. Smokejumpers Drip and Avalanche are working on the road construction filling the sink hole. Please | LIKE | COMMENT | SUBSCRIBE | Lightning McQueen almost crashes into Avalanche because Avalanche forgot to use cones.

item.title: Disney Pixar CARS - Story Sets ACTION !
item.description:
Disney Pixar CARS - Story Sets ACTION !

Next Video https://youtu.be/4VR7KKvMz_Q Cars Lightning McQueen Races and Jumps into electric wires, causes a big mess, His best bud Mater Arrives to save the day. DISNEY PIXAR Cars Toys Movies Lightning McQueen has a fun time driving through radiator springs story sets.

item.title: Disney/Pixar Cars 3 - Banana Cycle Minion races Lightning McQueen | Despicable me Minions
item.description:
Disney/Pixar Cars 3 - Banana Cycle Minion races Lightning McQueen | Despicable me Minions

NEXT MOVIE: https://youtu.be/V-mkVejK2mI Minions DAVE races legendary Lightning McQueen after a flat tire. Next: McQueen & Dave get teleported by Mack Hauler Previous Episode https://youtu.be/8hCB_xndUps You cant go anywhere else to see this exclusive BananaCycle - So fast it could actually keep up with Lightning McQueen.

item.title: Disney/Pixar Cars 3 - Lightning McQueen "FLAT-TIRE" & meets a "MINION" on a Banana Cycle
item.description:
Disney/Pixar Cars 3 - Lightning McQueen "FLAT-TIRE" & meets a "MINION" on a Banana Cycle

NEXT: https://youtu.be/V-mkVejK2mI Its cool when Dave the Minion shows up, its not cool when Lightning McQueen gets a flat-tire while on a mission to rescue Mater. PREVIOUS EPISODE https://youtu.be/8hCB_xndUps After "Lightning McQueen" sees his best bud "Mater" frozen he quickly starts driving FASTER then FAST! just to get the "right person" for the job.

item.title: Disney/Pixar Cars 3 - MACK Teleports Lightning McQueen & Minions Dave to Arendelle
item.description:
Disney/Pixar Cars 3 - MACK Teleports Lightning McQueen & Minions Dave to Arendelle

Mack Teleports Lightning McQueen & Minions Dave to their destination. Previous Episode: https://youtu.be/nKCkKvR9Rlk The race continues between Lightning McQueen and Minions Dave. Dave tells Lightning McQueen to give up, McQueen simply doesn't give in that easy. This time Minion Dave is in trouble he goes through a road block that ended up landing on top of Lighting McQueen.

item.title: Mater Misbehaves at McDonald's MATER BURGER ! Disney Pixar CARS TOYS MOVIES 3 Happy Meal
item.description:
Mater Misbehaves at McDonald's MATER BURGER ! Disney Pixar CARS TOYS MOVIES 3 Happy Meal

Next Day https://youtu.be/xe57nJMZT90 Mater goes to McDonald's restaurant before he mysteriously gets Frozen in Radiator Springs. Cars 3 https://youtu.be/I67RqxVvH-E Drive-Thru McDonald's character "HAPPY" loves the Delicious CARS 3 MATER BURGER ! Served in a "HAPPY MEAL" Whether you're on the road or just cruising around town, your favorite McDonald's menu items are never far away.

item.title: Mater Misbehaves at McDonald's ! Disney Pixar CARS TOYS MOVIES Happy Meal BURGER | Day: 1&2
item.description:
Mater Misbehaves at McDonald's ! Disney Pixar CARS TOYS MOVIES Happy Meal BURGER | Day: 1&2

Next Movie: https://youtu.be/I67RqxVvH-E Cars Animated Series: https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLgXCrZw9XUy-W-EuS7TJDtP94J-g2t6eG Mater makes his stop at McDonald's restaurant before going home to Radiator Springs, where he mysteriously gets Frozen. McDonald's employee says the "Mater Burger" is sold out and is asked to come back the next day.
